body:
His next victims are this pair of cute sisters. Too bad their lives are going to be ruined just by having to run into this guy

"Yes, but since now there are two, maybe that will give them a better chance to escape when the fourth hypnosis is over!"

You already saw it. With the luck that he has I doubt it

"*face sad*"
wait a sec wasnt he fucking the Imouto san in the previous chapter in an alley? so this should be her 2nd time not first.
